Html: Does anyone have a equivalent Razor Script file that can be swapped in for the FullTextSearch.xslt code?  This one one of the last XSLT marcos we have an'd i love to get it swapped out so we dont need developers that understand XSLT in addition to Razor.

Hi pynej

Thanks for providing the Razor script. We've released new versions supporting all recent versions of Umbraco. We've included the Razor script which is largely based on your original version and have credited you in the script :)

Many thanks,
Rigardt
Governor Technology
